descriptions.value: Beautiful and spacious SECOND FLOOR 3 bedroom apartment. Heat is included. Tenant is responsible for electricity only. Steps from J, L and M train. Apartment is available for SEPTEMBER 15, 2020.
Second Floor Three bedroom and one bathroom apartment in Private house. Very spacious bedrooms.Close to J and L Train Heat included.Contact_Luz_6462443220

Resident - 7mo ago - Everyone knows everyone ! Each store has its locals always familiar faces walking by and the small business around here always remember your face and eventually your name

Resident - 2mo ago - If the train are not delayed, i can be in Manhattan within 25 minutes. There are also bus stops within a few blocks
Resident - 4mo ago - I’ve lived in this neighborhood for six years. very clean, very peaceful and quiet. everything you need train, Hospital, stores and restaurants are near but also very expensive.
Resident - 4mo ago - Every thing is close by the public transportation, restaurants, grocery store all within walking distance.
Resident - 6mo ago - I drive but the subway’s nearby. There’s the A,C,L and J trains; 30 minutes to the city. Super Convenient!!!
Resident - 1mo ago - This area is very family oriented and the parks are maintained .I have lived in Bushwick for four years
Resident - 11mo ago - There are a lot of working class families. All are family oriented. People care for the neighborhood and each other

Resident - 9mo ago - Bushwick is undergoing gentrification so the community is divided. There are the old residence that have a sense of community and ties and the new populated that is different to say the least.
Resident - 8mo ago - Food is good around here. I’ve basically lived here for 24 years and it’s a good neighborhood. Good place to walk around.

Resident - 5mo ago - It’s convenient and there is no shortage of restaurants and bars. It’s dirty, the park is underfunded and relying on locals to maintain trash pickup and dog run maintenance. There are noisy sidewalk parties in the summer months. It’s usually bustling enough to feel safe alone at night.
Resident - 2mo ago - It’s a fun area with lots of shops and restaurants. Some crime, but an exciting place to live. Lots of art!
Resident - 8mo ago - you see dog owner walking their dogs all the time. this area has grown over the years. great area for animal lovers

Resident - 1w ago - This neighborhood is minutes away from Queens and Manhattan. Everything is nearby: restaurants, bars, stores, laundry mats, and public transportation. It’s very easy to get around and people are friendly.

Resident - 10mo ago - Bushwick is undergoing gentrification so the community is divided. There are the old residence that have a sense of community and ties and the new populated that is different to say the least.
Resident - 7mo ago - i have lived here for 45 yrs. i was raised here.  people need to clean after their dogs so our children and grd kids can enjoy the park and. walking thru the neighborhood
Resident - 2mo ago - It is a very safe and familiar neighborhood, it also has commercial stores, definitely a central location
Resident - 3w ago - The area has changed a lot. New restaurants and bars. It may not be good to raise a family but, it is good for a younger generation. Very pet friendly.  Difficult to park.
Resident - 3mo ago - I've lived here for about 10 years and the neighborhood has changed a lot. It's very easy to find a great bar or restaurant anywhere in the neighborhood.
